description: Readings indicate that the worst contamination around the Fukushima nuclear plant has not spread beyond the 19-mile range of highest concern established by Japanese authorities.
title: Japan Continues Efforts to Cool Nuclear Fuel
title_page: Japan Continues Efforts to Cool Nuclear Fuel - The New York Times
text:
Japan Continues Efforts to Cool Nuclear Fuel
Readings indicate that the worst contamination around the Fukushima nuclear plant has not spread beyond the 19-mile range of highest concern established by Japanese authorities.
